scripts.deploy-remote: npm run codegen && npm run build && graph deploy ${NAME:-null} --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token d3f08ff3f5d8463aabeb1623f9ce277c
scripts.create-local: npm run prepare && graph create --node http://localhost:8020/ sirenmarkets/protocol-v2
scripts.deploy-local: npm run prepare && graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 pascalclub/protocol-v2
